root.name: AntiKiller
root.description: OverviewAntiKiller is a third-person shooter that was developed by Qbik Interactive and published by ND Games for the PC platform.AntiKiller is based on a Russian action movie of the same name.PC System RequirementsWindows 95/98/XP/2000/VistaPentium III 1 GHz512 MB RAM16 MB graphic card1000MB HD3D graphics card
